itunes:title: Doctrine & Covenants 93 Part 1 : Dr. Casey Griffiths
title: Doctrine & Covenants 93 Part 1 : Dr. Casey Griffiths
description:
Is our house in order? Don't get discouraged! Dr. Casey Griffiths returns and shares the Lord's rebuke of Joseph and others in Section 93, but as we pattern ourselves after the Savior and learn "grace to grace," as He did, we too will become like our Heavenly Parents. 

Shownotes: https://followhim.co/ 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/followhimpodcast
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/followhimpodcast
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/FollowHimOfficialChannel

"Let Zion in Her Beauty Rise" by Marshall McDonald
https://www.marshallmcdonaldmusic.com/products/let-zion-in-her-beauty-rise-piano

Please rate and review the podcast.
